text: == Events == *February 2 – Battle of Diu took place near Diu, India. *April 22 – Henry VIII becomes King of England on the death of his father, Henry VII. *April 27 – Pope Julius II places Venice under interdict and excommunication for refusing to cede part of Romagna under Papal control *May 14 – Battle of Agnadello – French forces defeat the Venetians. * June 11 – Henry VIII of England marries Catherine of Aragon *June 24 – King Henry VIII of England's and Queen consort's Catherine of Aragon coronation ceremony. * August 8, 1509, Krishna devaraya became the ruler of the Vijayanagara Empire, the greatest emperor, scholar and writer.
